firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure focuses on a simple user authentication system using email/password. The primary collection is `/users/{userId}`, where each document stores user profile information. A separate `/customers/{userId}` collection is maintained to map Firebase users to their Stripe Customer IDs. This separation of concerns allows user profile data to be managed independently from billing information, which is a good practice.
